title: Top 10 Historical Sites to Visit in Istanbul
text: Istanbul is a city rich in history, spanning thousands of years and multiple empires. From the Byzantine era to the Ottoman period, the city is home to countless historical landmarks that tell the story of civilizations past.

title: Istanbul Food Guide: Best Restaurants and Street Food
text: Turkish cuisine is one of the world's most diverse and flavorful. Istanbul offers everything from traditional kebabs to modern fusion restaurants. This guide covers the best places to eat in the city.
summary: A comprehensive guide to Istanbul's culinary scene, featuring top restaurants and must-try street food

title: Best Time to Visit Istanbul: Weather and Seasons
text: Istanbul experiences a temperate climate with distinct seasons. Spring and autumn are generally considered the best times to visit, offering mild weather and fewer crowds. Summer can be hot and humid, while winter brings cooler temperatures and occasional snow.

title: Istanbul Transportation Guide: Getting Around the City
text: Istanbul has an extensive public transportation system including metro, trams, buses, and ferries. The Istanbulkart is a convenient way to pay for all forms of public transport. Taxis and ride-sharing services are also widely available throughout the city.
summary: Everything you need to know about transportation in Istanbul, from public transit to taxis
